trg_text: South Africa Investment Conference (SAIC) South Africa will host its fourth SAIC on Thursday, 24 March 2022 at the Sandton Convention Centre in Johannesbur The conference is part of government s investment drive to attract Rtrillion over five years, and it attracts delegates from South Africa and worldwide to discuss investment opportunitie Since the first investment conference in 2018, South Africa has attracted R774 billion in commitments across a wide range of economic sector Of the 152 investment announcements made previously, 45 projects have already been complete A further 57 projects are currently under constructio

trg_text: The National Water Week campaign takes place from Sunday, 20 to Saturday, 26 March 2022, and focuses on the need to protect and conserve our water resource Despite much heavier than normal rainfall in many parts of the country over the past few months, South Africa remains a water-scarce countr It is one of the 30 driest countries in the world and most of its water comes from rainfal
